name: AvB
description:
Somewhere on earth.. on a tulip field in a valley with no way out.. Astronauts are trying to kill you with ..playing cards? You must make your way to a windmill for some reason. Also, you can kill the astronauts ..for 30 seconds. With ..cuteness? Idk there are heart particles flying around. Based on a short Discord conversation.

Note: The game is very scuffed.

Known bugs:

- Game doesn't seem to close after pressing quit.
- Moving astronauts sometimes keep moving after being killed.
- Other ghostly artifacts.
- Lumen doesn't actually get enabled below "Chugfest" quality setting.
- Settings are ..very flakey.
